short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to be aware of your Assembla mentions when navigating in other tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assembla Mentions is a new extension that will provide mentions functionality outside Assembla's web application.
In this way you will be notified about new incoming mentions and also you will be able to navigate to them using this same extension.
